overview: Follow along as Ken Curtis, founder of Gateway Films/Vision Video, visits Louisiana State Penitentiary, better known as Angola Prison. As he was reflecting on the beatitudes in light of his journey with cancer, Ken wanted to learn from people who knew well the brokenness Jesus describes as blessed. This one-hour documentary presents the stories of inmates that bring clarity to Jesusâ€™ teaching as they share the blessedness of the beatitudes in their own lives.
tagline: Receiving Life at Angola State Penitentiary
title: Blessedness out of Brokenness
